org.epochx.ge.op.crossover
Interface GECrossover

All Superinterfaces:
Crossover, Operator
All Known Implementing Classes:
FixedPointCrossover, OnePointCrossover
public interface GECrossover
extends Crossover

This interface defines the structure which specific crossover operations can implement to provide different methods of crossing over two CandidatePrograms. GPCrossover instances are used by the core GRCrossover class to perform a single crossover operation.

See Also:
org.epochx.ge.model.GRCrossover

Method Summary
 GECandidateProgram[] crossover(CandidateProgram parent1, CandidateProgram parent2)
          Implementations should perform some form of exchange of material between the two children, returning the resultant children.
 

Method Detail

crossover

GECandidateProgram[] crossover(CandidateProgram parent1,
                               CandidateProgram parent2)
Implementations should perform some form of exchange of material between the two children, returning the resultant children.

Specified by:
crossover in interface Crossover
Parameters:
parent1 - The first GECandidateProgram selected to undergo this crossover operation.
parent2 - The second GECandidateProgram selected to undergo this crossover operation.
Returns:
An array of the child CandidatePrograms that were the result of an exchange of genetic material between the two parents.
